channel.title: Dragonic-Scape's First version, (more versions coming)
channel.description:
Hello, This is my first release so no flaming pl0x,
If you have any problems using this client: Aaron-element@hotmail.com
For new coders: Get jdk 6 update 20 or higher, edit compiler change the 1.6.0_2(your version) edit client.java use ctrl+h first one: aaronpoortinga.no-ip.biz 2th one ur pfwarded ip adress
[b]THIS IS JUST A FRICKING SOURCE I USED WHEN I STARTED CODING! SO NO FLAMING PLEASE!!! I STARTED WITH AN BLANK SOURCE SO 100% NO LEECH!!![/b] ENJOY!!! HERE ARE THE PICS.
http://www.mediafire.com/?d92ia4u43mesd21 FOR CLIENT http://www.mediafire.com/?vy4mi0q2a19qcv7 FOR SOURCE :D THIS IS MY FIST RELEASE SO DUNBEMAD :D i enjoyed it the 3 months i played it ;P
HERE ARE THE PICS.
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/lunapic_13084920217747_3.jpg[/img]
SHOPS: MUCH MORE BUT CBA PUTTING EM ALL ON THIS RELEASE LOL
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/SHOPS1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/SHOPS.jpg[/img]
GOLDEN RING OWNS!!!! DONT GIVE AWAY TO NORMAL PLAYERS LOL
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/GOLDRING.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/farming.jpg[/img]
MORE: 100% LUNAR!!!!
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/WORKINGLUNAR.jpg[/img]
PKBOX: WORKING 100%
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/Pkbox.jpg[/img]
NORTH OF PKBOX BANKS! [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/BANKSNORTHOFPKBOX.jpg[/img]
GWD: I KNOW ITS NUB! BUT HEY, ITS AN HANG SERVER LMAO
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/GWD.jpg[/img]
NICE STUFF!
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/CUSTOMSTUFF.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/customstuff2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/custom3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/custom4.jpg[/img]
ENJOY!!!!!
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/lunapic_13084920217747_3.jpg[/img]
CREDITS:
ME 80%!! FOR ADDING CUSTOM ITEMS, CLIENT, AND STUFF LIKE THAT! DELTA 15% THE MAKER OF THE CLEAN SERVER+CLIENT 5%!!!!
ENJOY<33333

item.title: Dragonic-Scape's First version, (more versions coming)
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:48, topic:409554”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=510834.msg3729892#msg3729892 date=1314555687]

Lol, I read til the first screenshot and it has custom items. I’m now writing this reply and I haven’t read anything else because Customs shouldn’t be in private servers. ^.^

People used to play rsps because of the customs, now people play rsps to get away from rs.

Because Runescape’s community is made of driveling 12 year olds who can’t type, complete assholes who take shit to serious, and the few who play private servers that aren’t driveling 12 year olds.
[/quote]

Exactly, but i’d say this rsps would have been popular back in the day when everyone who did play rsps, it was mainly for the customs.[/quote]

Yeah, but sadly customs are almost outdated and their bad for the server in many ways.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragonic-Scape's First version, (more versions coming)
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Zerofax, post:29, topic:409554”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=510834.msg3715990#msg3715990 date=1313632231]

Ease off with the custom shit… If it’s a 317, don’t try adding 508 items. If you want 508 items, get a 508.

That pring might fuck you over one day… Might as well remove it or an idiot will manage to get his hands on it.

The pring is a fucking annoyance cause its on most servers and it gives you like 1m str bonus.
[/quote]
so change it?[/quote]

I don’t have to because I’m not using this source.

Read full topic
